message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for this product and its value.  To make this work, I could come down to $17,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
